keyword: how many calories are in red bull energy drink
title: How Many Calories Are in Red Bull Energy Drink?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Red Bull energy drink (standard 250 ml can), including carbs, sugars, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Red Bull Energy Drink?
assumptions: Standard 250 ml can, original formula, carbonated, no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, flavor, region, and formulation; check can label for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 250 ml can of Red Bull energy drink has 110 calories, primarily from 27 g of sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Dilute with equal part sparkling water

faqs.q: How many calories are in Red Bull energy drink?
faqs.a: 110 calories in a standard 250 ml can.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in one Red Bull?
faqs.a: About 27 g of sugars per 250 ml can.

faqs.q: Does Red Bull have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 0 g protein and 0 g fat per can.
0 calories in the sugar-free version (250 ml).

faqs.q: Is Red Bull high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 105 mg sodium per 250 ml can.
